Returns: true if the log record should be published.
isLoggable(java.util.logging.LogRecord).Description: Check if a given log record should be published.

ClassDesc: A Filter can be used to provide fine grain control over what is logged, beyond the control provided by log levels. Each Logger and each Handler can have a filter associated with it. The Logger or Handler will call the isLoggable method to check if a given LogRecord should be published. If isLoggable returns false, the LogRecord will be discarded.
